lead_paragraph: In her speech accepting the Democratic nomination, Hillary Clinton wrongly implied Donald Trump has proposed banning Islam in America and sketched out a plan for defeating Islamic State militants that merely mirrors what the U.S. is already trying to do.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Misfires in Hillary Clinton's Speech
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Misfires in Hillary Clinton's Speech

snippet: In her speech accepting the Democratic nomination, Hillary Clinton wrongly implied Donald Trump has proposed banning Islam in America and sketched out a plan for defeating Islamic State militants that merely mirrors what the U.S. is already trying...
